body:
We have sent you a confirmation email.

### What happens next

We've sent your application to the Court of Protection.

They will contact you by email once they've checked it.

There may be a delay in processing your application because of the coronavirus outbreak.

### Tell us about your experience of notifying people

We’d like to know about your experience of notifying people when applying to the Court of Protection for a property and affairs deputyship.

Send your feedback to <cop_eapps@justice.gov.uk>. We’ll use your feedback to help improve the process.
heading: Application sent
